name: Twitter - Dark n Simple
description:
Changes the Twitter to a nice dark grey or grey to make it easy for the eyes. If you've found a bug, just Tweet me. Want to upload your own images to "Background Image" and "New Layout Banner Image"?
To change the background images upload an image to Twitter (HAS TO BE TWITTER). And copy the image url into "enter url".

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch
